channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Taylor Momsen Was Bitten By A Bat—What You Should Know About Rabies
item.description: Here's a quick refresher on rabies and prophylactic treatment if you are bitten by a bat or stray animal. Please also vaccinate your pets.
